sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: This is the video Ukraine says shows one of its sea drones about to strike a Russian tanker after a similar attack on one of Moscow's warships.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But Ukraine is also talking diplomacy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The head of Kyiv's delegation to a conference in Saudi Arabia tweeted that Ukraine's peace formula is the way to end the war, claiming it would benefit all nations, a theme picked up by President Zelensky. On the battlefield, Ukraine said Russian missiles targeted a factory in Zaporizhia city, which is a major facility for the maintenance and repair of aircraft engines.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A deadline for coup leaders to reinstate the civil government in Niger expires on Sunday with no sign the military junta will comply.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The ultimatum was presented by the Bloc of West African Nations, known as ECOWAS, a week ago, after the military toppled elected President Mohamed Bazoum.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Failure to reinstate him opens up the possibility of using force.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We want diplomacy to work and we want this message clearly transmitted to the leaders of the junta in Niger that we are giving them every opportunity to reverse what they have done.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But that hasn't happened and there's no sign it will.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The coup leaders have severed military cooperation with former colonial rulers France and there are reports in Western media that they've requested help from the Russian mercenary group Wagner on the streets of the capital protesters voice support for the takeover but just how much it's backed by the people is unclear around one and a half million young people gathered in a park in Lisbon on Saturday to hear a message of hope from the Pope.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Francis is in the Portuguese capital as part of the celebrations for World Youth Day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The faithful brave temperatures approaching 40 degrees Celsius to hear him speak. La única oportunidad, el único momento que es lícito mirar a una persona de arriba abajo es para ayudar a levantarse.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: ¿Cuántas veces vemos gente que nos mira así, por sobre el hombro, de arriba para abajo. Es triste. Palestinian gunman on Saturday opened fire in central Tel Aviv, killing an Israeli police

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: inspector before he was shot dead by another officer, authorities said.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The attack has deepened the spiral of violence that has gripped the region for the past year and a half.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Police identified the gunman as a 27-year-old from a village near the flashpoint city of Jenin in the northern West Bank.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Jenin's refugee camp last month was the site of the largest Israeli offensive in the West Bank in nearly two decades.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In the Philippines, one person died and nearly 100 were rescued after a ferry struck floating debris at sea and began taking on water on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Police say the accident was the third to hit the country in just over a week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: All those on board were rescued except for a female passenger who suffered a heart attack and died during the scramble for safety.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Sea accidents are common in the Philippines because of frequent storms, poorly maintained boats, overcrowding and the weak enforcement of safety regulations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Thousands of people gather in Hiroshima in memory of the victims of the US atomic bombing

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: of the Japanese city 78 years ago.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Participants, most of them dressed in black, said a silent prayer at the exact time the first nuclear weapon ever used in war was dropped on the city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Around 140,000 people died in the attack on the 6th of August 1945 and a further 74,000 in the atomic bombing of Nagasaki three days later.
